headline: Allegion Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: DUBLIN, April 10, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, today announced that its board of directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.51 per ordinary share of the company.

raw.headline: Allegion Declares Quarterly Dividend
